claim: Node.js runtime is recommended for long-running database operations or complex business logic.
scope: Applies when operations may exceed Edge Runtime 25s limit or require full Node.js API access.

evidence.excerpt: We recommend migrating from edge to Node.js for improved performance and reliability.
evidence.note: Vercel's official recommendation based on production data.

evidence.excerpt: Performance bottleneck is usually server to database latency, not user to server.
evidence.note: Explains why Edge Runtime often doesn't provide expected benefits.
